participant_1.background:
I'm glad I have such fond memories of fishing with my dad.
i can t live without my friends.
i teach kindergarten.
I would not be able to be a personal trainer if I were blind because I would not be able to see my clients' form and correct them.
I have a close relationship with my family despite my hectic schedule.

participant_2.background:
I used to go to subway with my dad.
I enjoy a cold glass of sweet tea to cool down on a hot summer day.
i am a waitress at a popular houston club.
my mother passed away in 1979.
i went to college in maryland.

content.text: Just working a shift at the club. What are you up to?
I'm teaching kindergarten right now, but I'm on break.
Oh cool! What made you want to be a teacher?
I have always enjoyed working with kids, and I love sharing my love of learning with them.
That's great! I used to want to be a teacher, but I changed my mind.
What made you change your mind?
I realized that I'm not good at being patient with kids.
I can understand that. It's definitely not for everyone.
Yeah, but I'm glad I found my passion.
Me too! I love my job.
That's great! I'm glad you found your calling.
Thanks! What do you like to do for fun?
I enjoy spending time with my family and friends, going to the movies, and reading.
That sounds like a lot of fun. I like doing those things too.
Cool! We should hang out sometime.
That would be fun! I'll give you my number.
